title: Disappearing Inc.
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230133/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230133/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries): Disappearing Inc.**

Delaware-based type collective headed up by designers [Jeff Prybolsky](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230133/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jeff%20Prybolsky) and [Jason Lucas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230133/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jason%20Lucas). Know for their 'take no prisoners' approach to design, the Disappearing Inc. library was best known for their aggressively grudge-flavoured faces.

Typefaces included [Fragile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230133/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1RH), [Cowpoke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230133/http:/www.identifont.com/show?26J), [Thumtax](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204230133/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8TR), and Twoface.
author: Grant Hutchinson
